long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
Timescape detects website usage so you can limit procrastination.
Most people don't realize how much time they waste on social media each day until they see the data. Timescape uses a variety of methods for people curb their screen usage.
Timescape is free to use, completely private, and open source. If you have any concerns, feel free to email codeitfast434@gmail.com.
